author: grouseuk

changelog.release_notes: 2.2 - fixed bug which stopped day of the week showing when no internet at first start
2.1 - Restores black and white version for original pebble watches and fixes weather reports
1.2 - fixed bug that stopped watchface realising bluetooth was not connected if launched when bluetooth is turned off or out of range.
1.1 - If weather cannot be loaded within 60 seconds (due to no bluetooth or internet connection) the day of the week will be displayed until connection is re-established.

First release.

Known bug: currently no timeout on weather grab (will continue to show 'loading...' until connection regained).

description:
Mars Red orbital circles displaying time (including seconds), date, current temperature and wind speed, graphical and numeric battery level (with charging indicator) and Bluetooth disconnection alert.

On Bluetooth connection lost, icon will flash for 20 seconds before vibrating to confirm connection lost. Useful reminder if you leave your phone behind when leaving the house! If weather cannot be loaded within 60 seconds (due to no bluetooth or internet connection) the day of the week will be displayed until connection is re-established.

latest_release.release_notes: 2.2 - fixed bug which stopped day of the week showing when no internet at first start

title: Flying In Orbit
